com.constantcontact.authentication
Class CtcOAuth2

java.lang.Object
  com.constantcontact.authentication.CtcOAuth2
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICtcOAuth2
public class CtcOAuth2
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICtcOAuth2

Access point for the implementation of OAuth2 made in AuthenticationHttpProcessor.
Provides functionality to obtain an OAuth2 access token for a user.
You should simply call one of the:

  • getAccessToken() ;
to trigger the OAuth2 authentication flow and obtain the token.

Author:
ConstantContact

Constructor Detail

CtcOAuth2

public CtcOAuth2()
Default constructor. If no parameter is provided, the OAuth2 access token will be obtained based on ConfigurationManager through "app.config" file.

Method Detail

getAccessToken

public java.lang.String getAccessToken()
Request the access token using the old HttpClient approach.

Specified by:
getAccessToken in interface ICtcOAuth2
Returns:
Returns the access token.

getAccessTokenUrl

public java.lang.String getAccessTokenUrl(java.lang.String code)
Get the URL to obtain an access token.

Specified by:
getAccessTokenUrl in interface ICtcOAuth2
Parameters:
code - Code returned from Constant Contact after a user has granted access to their account.
Returns:
Returns an URL string.

getAuthorizationUrl

public java.lang.String getAuthorizationUrl(boolean server)
Get the URL at which the user can authenticate and authorize the requesting application.

Specified by:
getAuthorizationUrl in interface ICtcOAuth2
Parameters:
server - Whether or not to use OAuth2 server flow, alternative is client flow.
Returns:
Returns the authorization URL.
